n, m = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.sort(reverse=True)

if a[m-1] >= sum(a)/(4*m):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

# Read input
n, m = map(int, input().split())
votes = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Check if the most popular item has enough votes
if max(votes) >= (sum(votes) / (4 * m)):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


n, m = map(int, input().split())  # n: 都市の数 m: 道路の数
a = list(map(int, input().split()))  # a: 都市の人口
a.sort(reverse=True)  # 降順にソート

if a[m-1] >= sum(a)/(4*m):  # 道路がm本の場合の最小人口が平均人口の4倍以上
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


# Read input from STDIN
n, m = map(int, input().split())
votes = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Check if the most popular item has enough votes to win
if max(votes) >= (sum(votes) / (4 * m)):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
